title: Gavelbangers Ball
description: THIS WEEK: with guest bailiff Monte Bailiff Belmonte and a SECRET expert witness. Caroline brings this case against her boyfriend Will, who's been trying to sell her on his favorite metal bands to no avail.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
